name: Dark Mode Toggle
description: Add dark theme option to settings for better user experience at night

name: Export to PDF
description: Allow users to export reports and dashboards as PDF files

name: Social Media Login
description: Enable login via Google, Facebook, and Apple accounts

name: Mobile App Push Notifications
description: Send real-time notifications to mobile users

name: Advanced Search Filters
description: Add more granular filtering options to the search functionality

name: Bulk Data Import
description: Allow users to import large datasets via CSV or Excel

name: Real-time Collaboration
description: Enable multiple users to work on the same document simultaneously

name: Custom Branding
description: Allow enterprise customers to customize the app with their branding

name: API Rate Limiting
description: Implement rate limiting to prevent API abuse
